message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not quite comfortable meeting you halfway. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit. How about $11,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit too high for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I'm not quite ready to meet you in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I need to ensure I get a good price for the product. How about $11,200?
I'm still not comfortable with $11,200. I'd be willing to go up to $10,800, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,800. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to think about my minimum price. How about $11,500?
I'm really close to walking away from this deal, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, which would be $11,200. Can you accept that?
I'm not willing to meet you at $11,200, Bob. I think I can do better than that. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I need to think about my minimum price. How about $11,700?

I'm not willing to go any higher than $11,200. I'm really close to walking away from this deal. I think we're at a stalemate. I'm willing to walk away and buy the product from John for $8,000 if we can't come to an agreement.
